name: Galaxy Pong! - KIT109-Pong - Assignment 1
description:
Galaxy Pong! 

This is my galactic take on the classic arcade game Pong.

You can choose between a Singleplayer (where you play against a Bot) and a Multiplayer (where you can play against your friend!) I hope you will have fun with it!

Please enjoy in full-screen-mode for the best experience!^^
